title: Unable to create bookmark folder
content: I have three folders inside my Other Bookmarks. I created the first one a while ago and created another two today. However, when I go to create my fourth one, the option is gray and can't be clicked like in the image. I don't know what else you need to know, so feel free to ask below.
creator: richieandersonjoe

title: Vertical scroll bar jumps and skips down especially on long pages
content:
I know this question has been asked before but I am hoping for an update and maybe to learn something new to try...

I installed the latest Firefox (April 2021) on Ubuntu mate 64 bit.

I use my laptop Touchpad to move the cursor around on web pages. I go to the vertical scroll bar to scroll down the page... I left click on the scroll bar, hold the left button, then start dragging down on the Touchpad but.

Often, when I am on a web page that is long, the scroll bar will jump and skip all the way to the bottom of the screen even though I'm just dragging it down a little and slowly too. Sometimes the scroll bar keeps racing down the page even when I am not dragging the cursor down at all.

I don't notice this behavior in Chrome or Brave or in other Ubuntu mate user interface elements.

This question has been asked before e.g: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1314677

I tried solutions in that question such as going in to about:config and tried... general.smoothScroll.scrollbars.durationMaxMS (changed this from 150 to 75) general.smoothScroll.scrollbars.durationMinMS (changed this from 150 to 50)

I also downgraded to Firefox 82.0.3 but this has not solved the problem either.

Is this a known bug that is being worked on? What else can I try apart from switching back to Brave?

Cheers,

Flex
creator: flexmcmurphy

title: Video won't play on CNN
content:
Hi, none of the videos appear/play on this CNN site that is all about videos. Only still shots appear. The videos play in Chrome. Here is the site: https://www.cnn.com/2021/04/23/world/videos-of-the-week-mobile-april-23/index.html

I've already tried toggling the "Enhanced Protection" switch off and on to no effect. I don't see any option for enabling/disabling permissions for audio/video in the address bar as appear on other sites offering video or audio. Thanks for any remedies.
creator: totaltampa

title: firefox browser keeps crashing a few minutes while in use.
content:
Hello community, Long time firefox user here, my firefox browser keeps crashing a few minutes while in use. Every time it crashes I need to reset my proxy settings to have internet connection. Safari and chrome has no issues. Problem started when I upgraded my macbook from High sierra to Catalina. I'm running version 87 64bit, I tried downgrading to 82 and worked my way up in different version. Problem persisted, the I tried running Firefox on safe mode and clearing Cache. Problem still persist, I do not know what else to do. Someone please help. I'm running Catalina 10.15.7, I attached a screenshot of my crash reports for some insight.

I appreciate anything anyone can do.

Rudy
creator: staind9491

title: czarny ekran przy filmach dzwięk jest
creator: mikado109

title: Mac Dock Apps are frozen when firfox 88.0 is running
content:
I just updated to Firefox 88.0 on my Macbook Pro running MacOS Big Sur 11.2.3. If I restart my laptop, all my dock apps work as they are supposed to. I can click on any of them and they will open up. If open Firefox, the first 6 dock apps freeze up. I cannot open them from the dock or even drag them off the dock. All other dock apps operate fine from the 7th one on to the right. This is all new as I have used Firefox as my main browser for years. i can use Safari and everything works properly. I prefer Firefox.

Any suggestions or ideas are appreciated. Tom
creator: uncletunes

title: Autoplay block does not work, FF 88.0
content:
FF 88.0.

Tried https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1278114 and it worked but only few minutes. Block video and audio does not work, about:config does not work. I have had plugin FEBE for passwords and worked well. Now it does not work because of new Firefox in 2017. I have found i can export/import through Firefox but one problem: i need go to about:config and add something for import or export. What are programmers doing?? If you don´t know how to program something, don´t do it.

content:

title: cache not clearing
content: Suddenly, cache is not emptying when 'Clear data' is used. Also suddenly, 'Delete cookies and site data when Firefox is closed' preference is faded out/ unavailable. 'Never remember history' is checked as usual but cache does not clear when Firefox is closed. All cookies and data cleared without problem 2 days ago. This has never happened before.
